<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\file This pass does a few optimisations related to Tail predicated loops</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and MVE VPT blocks before register allocation is performed. For VPT blocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the goal is to maximize the sizes of the blocks that will be created by the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">/// MVE VPT Block Insertion pass (which runs after register allocation). For</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">/// tail predicated loops we transform the loop into something that will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// hopefully make the backend ARMLowOverheadLoops pass&#39;s job easier.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function converts loops with t2LoopEnd and t2LoopEnd instructions into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a single t2LoopEndDec instruction. To do that it needs to make sure that LR</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be valid to be used for the low overhead loop, which means nothing else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is using LR (especially calls) and there are no superfluous copies in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop. The t2LoopEndDec is a branching terminator that produces a value (the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// decrement) around the loop edge, which means we need to be careful that they</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be valid to allocate without any spilling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This optimisation attempts to reduce the number of overlapping lifetimes of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VCCR values by replacing uses of old VCCR values with VPNOTs. For example,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this replaces</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %A:vccr = (something)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %B:vccr = VPNOT %A</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %Foo = (some op that uses %B)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %Bar = (some op that uses %A)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// With</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %A:vccr = (something)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %B:vccr = VPNOT %A</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %Foo = (some op that uses %B)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %TMP2:vccr = VPNOT %B</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %Bar = (some op that uses %A)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MVETPAndVPTOptimisations::ReduceOldVCCRValueUses(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The last VCMP that we have seen and that couldn&#39;t be replaced.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
